name: Bug Storm
description:
A barebones 2D Real Time Strategy based off of the idea of Netstorm. 

In the game you must prevent insect hives from spreading across your last surviving floating islands by destroying the Mother Nest.

Collect Power credits from the Storm Geysers and build a siege army to destroy the insect threat!


Controls :

  • WASD to move the camera
  • Left click to select and place buildings,
  • Right click to order units/unselect building.
  • Number 1 and 2 to quick-build bridges.

There is only one level in the game, all assets were made during the 48 hour LD compo period.

Tools used: GameMaker Studios
Paint.net
Audacity
